item.title: Contact
item.description:
I can be reached out at jigyasu [at] outlook.in or jigyasu [at] sktime.net

Some of my relevant accounts on the web:

  • GitHub
  • LinkedIn

item.title: Now
item.description:
What is a now page? Read more about them here.

Update: November 15, 2025

These days I have been working on the benchmarking infrastructure of sktime. We want it to reach a maturity stage where any one can easily reproduce an existing benchmarking experiment and I believe we’re quite close to our goal. This is in continuity to my project from European Summer of Code.

I am also getting interested in the use of machine learning in biology and particulary AI’s application in drug discovery. I reached out to a professor to let me work with her and her lab and luckily she agreed. We will most probably be working on protein-lipid interactions. I will write more about it in the future.

item.title: The Endless Pursuit of a Personal Website
item.description:
Final, Final_1, Final_2, Final_3, …, Final_N?

Ever since I started to understand how internet works, I wanted to have my personal website. You may ask why? And I have no particular answers, perhaps I just wanted to put myself out there?

When I was in middle school and I did not know how to code websites, I used to use tools like Wordpress and PortfolioBox. They always left me dissatisfied because of how clunky and bloated they felt. But using them made me form my own philosophy around website designs - I ended up knowing what I don’t like and it is very important to know what you don’t like!

item.title: But What Is European Summer of Code?
item.description:
If you’re reading this, you probably already have an idea of how rewarding it is to contribute to impactful open-source projects. There are several programs like GSoC, LFX Mentorship, SoB, and etcetera, which provides new contributors with opportunities to work on exciting open-source projects and learn a lot all while getting a good stipend.

ESoC or the European Summer of Code is one such relatively new program, the description from their website reads,
